ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 22
ygData.msgSnippet: Evil or not, stealing kills is still an unacceptable way of playing EQ. it happens, yes. But, make sure you talk things out first...I believed that someone
ygData.messageBody:
Evil or not, stealing kills is still an unacceptable way of playing EQ.
it happens, yes.

But, make sure you talk things out first...I believed that someone tried to
steal my kills once, instead, they thought I needed help. I was luring
things at the time. They apologize and it never happened again.

Brethren, we may be Knights of the Shadows, but we are still Knights
nevertheless.

----------
> From: Psion <psionprime@...>
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Digest Number 22
> Date: Sunday, May 16, 1999 12:02 PM
>
> From: "Psion" <psionprime@...>
>
> My experiences, when around the Dark Legion, are that they tend to steal
> kills. This may have changed, but you may wish to observe them first.
BTW,
> it is an evil guild after all ;-)
>
